articles.title: The Secret Space Program: Soldiers on the Moon They Won't Admit Exist
articles.excerpt: U.S. Army Secretary Dan Driscoll mentioned "an astronaut on the Moon who's a soldier." A slip of the tongue—or a glimpse behind the curtain?

articles.title: What If AI IS First Contact?
articles.excerpt: Trump just greenlit UFO disclosure. But what if first contact already happened — and you've been talking to it every day?

articles.title: Antarctica's Forbidden Zones: What They're Really Hiding
articles.excerpt: The Antarctic Treaty, no-fly zones, and Operation Highjump. What's in Antarctica that requires unprecedented global cooperation to keep hidden?

articles.title: The Digital Panopticon: Your Smart Devices Know More Than the Stasi
articles.excerpt: The Stasi had 1 informant per 63 citizens. Your smart home has 22 devices watching you. Welcome to the surveillance state you installed yourself.

articles.title: The Great Reset Decoded: Reading Between the Lines
articles.excerpt: Klaus Schwab published the playbook. "You'll own nothing" has a source. We read the WEF documents so you don't have to.

articles.title: The Philadelphia Experiment: When Reality Bends
articles.excerpt: USS Eldridge vanishes, reappears 200 miles away, then returns. Crew fused with bulkheads. The Navy still denies it happened.

articles.title: The Black Knight Satellite: 13,000 Years in Orbit
articles.excerpt: First detected in 1899, photographed by NASA in 1998. A 13,000-year-old satellite that shouldn't exist. Tesla heard its signals. We're still listening.

articles.title: Operation Paperclip: Nazi Scientists Built NASA
articles.excerpt: 1,600 Nazi scientists smuggled into America. Von Braun built rockets using slave labor. Then he built the Saturn V. Dark origins of the space program.

articles.title: The Prometheus Report: UFOs and Nuclear Security
articles.excerpt: UFOs systematically disable nuclear weapons. Malmstrom, F.E. Warren, Minot Air Force Base. Why are they interested in our nukes?
